bug.author: fabrees
bug.description: I set up the sync with nextcloud over webdav. For images and sidecar files the sync does work. But videos will not be synced. Import of videos via the import folder mechanism does work for me. Looking at the code, the file internal\workers\sync_refresh.go does not list videos as supported type. Would it be possible to add videos via webdav/nextcloud sync, too? Thanks.

comments.comment: You're right. Probably tried to prevent a situation where PhotoPrism downloads complete Hollywood movie collections, just like we don't download business documents. There should definitely be a file size limit and a setting to disable videos completely. Otherwise, the next issue that pops up will be "WebDAV sync is very slow and requires lots of storage" ðŸ¥³
